Init method. Call the Ventilation super() init and then store few more input

Parameters:

  • name (str) ‚Äì name

  • unit (str) ‚Äì value of the unit: [‚ÄúVol/h‚Äù, ‚Äúkg/s‚Äù, ‚Äúkg/(m2 s)‚Äù, ‚Äúm3/s‚Äù, ‚Äúm3/(m2 s)‚Äù]

  • nominal_value (float) ‚Äì the value to be multiplied by the schedule

  • schedule (eureca_building.schedule.Schedule) ‚Äì Schedule object with a fractional schedule

  • tag (str, default None) ‚Äì a tag to define the type of internal load

  • surfaces_with_opening (list) ‚Äì list of eureca_building.surface.Surface objects (those considered for the natural ventilation purposes

  • weather (eureca_building.weather.WeatherFile) ‚Äì Weather object
